item.title: Income investors can use this strategy to boost 2026 performance, according to Morningstar
item.description: Companies have been snapping up their own shares. Adding a few of those stocks to your portfolio may lift performance.

item.title: The stars are lining up for this PayPal-Amazon hybrid, according to the charts
item.description: Todd Gordon breaks down the technicals on this LatAm giant.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says buy these defense stocks post Venezuela and Iran
item.description: The firm is highlighting Northrop Grumman and other defense names in light of recent U.S. missions, according to a client note.

item.title: Jensen Huang CES keynote ignites analyst optimism on Nvidia's future
item.description: JPMorgan analyst Harlan Sur said that Nvidia's development of physical AI "could potentially drive the next leg of revenue growth" for the company.

item.title: One ‘under-the-radar’ sector traders are watching as the U.S. takes action in Venezuela
item.description: Jay Woods highlights three sectors that could benefit from the U.S.-Venezuela crisis.
